title: Collective optimization: A practical collaborative approach

notes.note: All benchmarks, datasets, tools, models and experimental results have been released in cTuning public optimization repository of knowledge [$#cm_4d63887b5cda54aa_122a0cb1e6ff9fc1#$] for collaborative validation and extension!
